name: Futa Groves
description:
Futa Groves is an adult visual novel intended for adult audiences 18+ about a guy down on his luck. He decides to take a month off to figure out what to do with his life.That's when he meets two women...

This game is being developed at the moment,Here you can play version 0.1 which will act as a demo.I repeat this game is intended for mature audiences and has themes of female domination,sissification,humiliation and numerous others as well. If these kind of things offend you don't play this game.

If you want to support me you can do so on patreon
